title: DACATARAI STANCE
RENDAX STANCE
FIRE IN THE HOLE
INSANE BRAVERY
CALL OF GLORY
BRAVE CHARGE
INSPIRING LEADER
NO ESCAPE
DEFEND OUR HONOR
SUDDEN CHARGE
CAPTAIN'S SHIELD
HEROIC MANOUVERS
FOR THE EMPEROR
FERVOR OF TERRA
general: Gain 1 [D]. *newpara* If your opponent has more unrouted units than you gain 2 (S).
Gain 1[D]. *newpara* If your opponent has an unrouted unit that is not a command level 0 unit, gain 1 (S) and 1 (B).
General: Gain 1[D]. *newpara* If you have less units than your opponent gain 1[M] or 1[D].
General: Gain 1 [D]. *newpara* Rally up to 2 units.
Choose one of your units and gain that unit’s Morale value as shield tokens
Spend 1 [M] to gain 2 [B]. At the end of the assess damage step rout 1 of your units.
Rally a unit. Draw a combat card.
unit: Custodian: If your opponent suffers damage this execution round they suffer 2 more damage
Custodian: If you have at least 1 [B] or 1 (B) at the start of the assess damage step of this execution round, force your opponent to rout 1 of their units.
Spend 1 [M] and choose a unit, during this execution round that unit cannot become routed.
Custodian/Champion: Spend 1[M] and force your opponent to lose 1[B] or 1[M].
Blade Champion: Spend 1 [D] to gain 3 (B) and your opponent may retreat up to 2 units.
Blade Champion: Spend 1 [M] to gain 1[B] or 1 [S].
Champion: The first time this execution round when an enemy unit is routed it’s destroyed unless your opponent spends 2 [D] when a unit is routed.
Custodian: Choose a unit, in the beginning of the next execution round if that unit is routed rally that unit.
Shield Captain: Gain 3 (B), your opponent may spend 1 [M] to retreat up to 3 units.
Shield Captain: Gain 2 (S). *newpara* You may reroll up to 2 [B]
Shield Captain: You may retreat any amount of units, gain 2 (B) for each unit retreated. Then rally one of the units that retreated.
Valoris: For this combat you have a dice limit of 12 dice. You may then resolve the general ability of this card again.
Valoris: Play any other combat card from your hand.

title: GUARDS OF THE EMPEROR
HEROIC INTERVENTION
EMPEROR'S WILL
DEEP STRIKE
EMPEROR'S CALL
general: When discarding order tokens in combat gain an extra shield or attack token.
After resolving a Dominate Order resolve an Advance Order in the active sector. Limit once per turn. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.
After resolving this order treat all empty worlds that do not contain your objective tokens as friendly worlds for the rest of the game.

When resolving an advance order and starting a combat in a world, in the reinforcement phase if you place a reinforcement token you may also take an Allarus Custodian from any world and place them on that world. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.
When you reveal this order, choose a unit in the active system. Rally that unit. You may then move that unit to an adjacent area. This can start a combat. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.
